title: How Rocket Learning's Founder Uses Tech to Teach the Poor

media:group.media:title: How Rocket Learning's Founder Uses Tech to Teach the Poor
media:group.media:description:
Azeez Gupta was a business analyst who ditched the corporate world for a mission in education. As founder of Rocket Learning, he's using technology to help teach Indian children of all socioeconomic backgrounds.

#India #RocketLearning #GameChangers
